thread.title: RENAE
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by RENAE

author: RENAE
title: RENAE
text: Car was booked online and collection made at the Airport. We did have some hicups at time of collection as we thought the purchase of additional insurance covered damage, windscreens, liabilty, etc, however we discovered that everything wasn't covered. We therefore had to pay an additional daily fee to waive any excess. We also discovered that we needed to pay for additional drivers. Neither of these impeded on the overall hire of the vehicle though and all in all it was fine.
